saying: Let gossip go in one ear and out the other.
description: Annalise is a snooty horse who appears in Animal Crossing, and Doubutsu no Mori e+, as an islander. After her absence from Animal Crossing: Wild World and Animal Crossing: City Folk, she returned as a villager in Animal Crossing: New Leaf. Her Japanese catchphrase, Sava, is the Japanese pronunciation of the French greeting, "Ça va". Due to her being an islander in Animal Crossing and Doubutsu no Mori e+, she has a fruit allergy. She loves pears and is allergic to oranges.
